attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the closure of the charity that is called Birdline, as they are only interested in profit and not the welfare of the parrots that they use, for display. I became an ACO for Birdline, and it was not till then I could see the other side of this Charity. Birds are passed around like sweets, and moved up and down the country in terrible conditions. The birds should come first. But that is not the case with this Charity.
